recipe_text: Quantity; 450; Prepare 450 grams of ground beef| Measurement; 150; Measure out 150 grams of onion, chopped| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Measurement; 800; Measure out 800 grams of black beans, drained and rinsed| Measurement; 480; Measure out 480 grams of tomato sauce| Measurement; 400; Measure out 400 grams of tomatoes, chopped| Measurement; 15; Measure out 15 grams of chili powder| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of cumin| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Measurement; 240; Measure out 240 grams of water| Untimed; None; In a large pot, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned| Untimed; None; Add onion and garlic to the pot and cook until softened| Untimed; None; Stir in black beans, tomato sauce, tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, salt, black pepper, and water| Untimed; None; Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer| Timed; 3000; Simmer for 50 minutes, stirring occasionally| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Betsy's Black Bean Chili
